Articles.Content: It's all coming together somehow
Freddy can you make your parts use tweak scale

Freddy can you make your parts use tweak scale

I am quite busy with the KRJ parts, currently. But I'd love to add this in the future (...when I know, how to do it )
CoffeeSE just released his unfinished airliner parts with a CC-BY-NC-SA 4.0 license. You might want to check it out and see if any of it would be useful to youÃ¢â‚¬â€œsave you some time.

Hey, I've finished nearly all of the prototype parts of the KRJ and Q400. What's left is to import the KRJ wing mount to the game. In the future I'll add more small details to the parts.

Here's my attempt of a Q400:

Do you have some suggestions

Yes. Guess so like some for the K-737 and some for the k900 and the KRJ
are the krj parts mk1 or 2.5 m?

are the krj parts mk1 or 2.5 m?

the size is between 1.25m and 2.5m, it's 1.875m. This diameter is not that common in KSP, but it was the best possible solution. 2.5m would be way too big...

To make it easier to use, I'm creating all the fuselage parts you'd need to build 1.875m aircrafts. Also there are other mods with parts in that size.

-Freddy
Freddy, how are the parts going?

Freddy, how are the parts going?

I'm currently very busy with a lot of other stuff, and I don't want the parts to be in a too unfinished state , but this is a development thread, so maybe I just upload the parts, and make them better from time to time...what do you think?

But I've finished all the 3d models and textures, in a couple of days I've got them all working in KSP

Edited March 11, 2015 by FreddyPhantom
okay cool

The last weeks I had no working computer available, but now all issues are fixed and I can continue my work on Fantom Works.

-Freddy
Yay!!
Hey how about an A-10 Warthog cockpit with a diameter of 1.25 m?

I asked about this on the KAX thread but I figure ask a couple of people and someone is bound to answer. Before I get too far that c-130 cockpit looks amazing (Shameless butting up to get what I want) I've been working on a v-22 osprey and there is a lack of cockpits that fit the bill. I wanted to see if someone can model one. I am just a light .cfg basher and a Photoshop dabbler so I lack the necessary skills. But here is what I have so far
